title: Baumstam - On Tour (1972/1994) [FLAC]
description:
Baumstam - On Tour (1972/1994)

Genre: Germany, Hard Progressive Rock

A little-known band which made one single and a tremendous album. Their album consisted of nine standard-length, blues-based hard rock songs, similar to rural sounding loud rockin' bands like Reaction and Incredible Hog. Part of the album was recorded live. The great treasure of this album is the mean and growling guitar sound, with the fuzz effects exaggerated to the extreme!
